Class GameController

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
pl.polsl.mateuszlawinski.snake.controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameController
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Class is responsible for all game processes

1.0

  • Method Details

    • run

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> run​(java.lang.String[] args) throws ArgumentException
      Method loads parameters to array and call checkInput to check them
      Parameters:
      args - parameters entered by user
      Returns:
      ArrayList included parameters entered by user
      Throws:
      ArgumentException - exception if parameters are not correct

    • exitGame

      private void exitGame​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Method closes the game
      Parameters:
      e - event which indicates that a keystroke occurred in a component

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Method stars the game

    • addSnakeElement

      private void addSnakeElement()
      Method adds a new part of snake to the ArrayList

    • eatApple

      private void eatApple()
      Method checks if an apple is eaten by snake. If it is true new apple is created and addSnakeElement() is called

    • gameOver

      private void gameOver()
      Method called if game is done

    • checkSnakePosition

      private void checkSnakePosition()
      Method is responsible for checking position of the snake. If snake is out of the board or snake eats his tail gameOver() is called

    • snakeOutside

      private boolean snakeOutside()
      Method checks position of snake's head
      Returns:
      true if snake's head is out of the board or false if it is not

    • eatTail

      private boolean eatTail()
      Method checks position of snake's head and the elements of his body
      Returns:
      true if snake's head and one of elements of snake's body are on the same place false if they are not

    • paint

      public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Method is responsible for paint graphics
      Overrides:
      paint in class javax.swing.JComponent

      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Method is responsible for draw elements of our game in the window
      Parameters:
      g - graphic

    • moveSnake

      private void moveSnake()
      Method moves the snake on the board

    • checkInput

      private boolean checkInput​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> array) throws ArgumentException
      Method checks correctness of the parameters on input
      Parameters:
      array - stores parameters from input
      Returns:
      true if parameters are correct
      Throws:
      ArgumentException - if parameters are not integer
